backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that stores contact form tickets in a map and provides methods to submit forms, update status, and modify categories.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented UI changes and the files associated with header and footer logo removals.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text listing short summaries of all frontend source files, including components, assets, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind‑based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point providing the root element and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component composing the header, hero, service tiers, contact form, and footer.
frontend/src/components/ContactFormSecti: React contact form with validation, success state, and backend submission via React Query.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with background image, headline, feature icons, and smooth‑scroll CTA buttons.
frontend/src/components/ServiceTiersSect: Displays three service tiers with pricing, features, and a CTA that scrolls to the contact form.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer component with brand info, navigation scroll buttons, and social media links.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Header with scrolling behavior, desktop and mobile navigation, and smooth section scrolling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout handling, and identity persistence via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a mutation hook that submits contact form data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables for light and dark modes plus layout utilities.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Generates base-path-aware URLs for static assets using environment BASE_URL.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, containers, animations, and theme variables.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s state, including schema version, feature definitions, pending requests, and metadata for removing header and footer logos.
